synopsis.text: For timid orphan Shinta Mizumura, life at a prestigious Tokyo missionary school is predictable and uneventful, until the arrival of the captivating and enigmatic Lilith. Hailing from Romania, Lilith carries a secret that will forever alter Shinta's world. As it turns out, Shinta is the latest descendant of the legendary Romyuarudo vampire hunters, and Lilith is a half-human, half-vampire seeking a dire pact. In order to survive, Lilith must bear a child with the vampire slayer and then end both their lives. Caught in the throes of destiny, Shinta and Lilith must navigate the treacherous waters of their entwined fates, as they determine their own path forward.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
